text: She Done Him Wrong is a 1933 American romantic comedy movie directed by Lowell Sherman and was based on the 1928 play Diamond Lil by Mae West (who also stars). Also starring Cary Grant, Owen Moore, Gilbert Roland, Rochelle Hudson, Noah Beery Sr., Rafaela Ottiano and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1934. ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1933 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Lowell Sherman Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in the 1890s
title: She Done Him Wrong
